generated_doNotEdit.title: Buoyant
generated_doNotEdit.description: Enables an entity to float on the specified liquid blocks.

fields.title: Apply Gravity
fields.description: Applies gravity each tick. Causes "movement_type" to be more impactful, but also gravity to be applied more intensely outside liquids.

fields.title: Base Buoyancy
fields.description: Base buoyancy used to calculate how much will a entity float.

fields.title: Big Wave Probability
fields.description: Probability for a big wave hitting the entity. Only used if "movement_type" is "waves".

fields.title: Big Wave Speed
fields.description: Multiplier for the speed to make a big wave. Triggered depending on "big_wave_probability".

fields.title: Can Auto Step From Liquid
fields.description: Whether the entity can move out of a liquid block to a neighboring solid block if pushed against it.

fields.title: Drag Down On Buoyancy Removed
fields.description: How much an entity will be dragged down when the component is removed.

fields.title: Liquid Blocks
fields.description: List of blocks this entity can float on. Must be a liquid block.

fields.title: Movement Type
fields.description:
Type of vertical movement applied to the entity:
"waves", simulates wave movement based on the entity speed.
"bobbing", simulates waves going through.
"none", simulates waves going through.
